title: Software Engineer
description:
At ABB, we help industries outrun \\- leaner and cleaner. Here, progress is an expectation \\- for you, your team, and the world. As a global market leader, we’ll give you what you need to make it happen. It won’t always be easy, growing takes grit. But at ABB, you’ll never run alone. Run what runs the world.
   

  

 This Position reports to:
   

  

 Digital Solution Engineering Manager
   

  

  

  

**Your role and responsibilities**
 In this role, We are looking for a software developer to join our Process Automation Digital Organization. The role requires one to be responsible for developing automation for validating flows in the software application, performance engineering, industrial data preparation, automating simulation data and executing scripts in CI/CD pipeline to deliver a product of the highest quality
   

  

 This role is contributing to Process Automation business for Process Automation Digital division based in Bangalore Southfield, India
   

  

 Your responsibilities:
   

  

* This role is predominantly focused on UI test development.
* The responsibilities include understanding the product/feature by discussing with the SME and automate the test cases.
* Participate in regular code reviews with a high bar on the quality of the code.
* Fix issues in testing and bugs in the test pipeline.
* The expectation is to not write test cases, but an aptitude of testing is required for this role


**Qualifications for the role**
* Bachelor/master’s degree in computer science or equivalent from premier institutes.
* Good written and verbal communication skills.
* 3\\+ years of total experience writing code in C\\#/JavaScript/TypeScript and Selenium/Protractor.
* Understanding of UI automation best practices.
* Experience in Web Services testing (REST /SOAP).
* Experience in UI/API test development.
* Experience in developing UI automation framework is plus.
* Experience/Knowledge of web protocols and system architecture is desired.
* Experience working with global teams highly desirable.


 Nice To Have
   

  

* Experience in Microsoft Azure platform development.
* Microsoft Azure Certifications


**More about us**
 Our Process Automation business offers a range of solutions for process and hybrid industries, including our industry\\-specific integrated automation, electrification and digital solutions, control technologies, software and advanced services, as well as measurement \\& analytics, marine and turbocharging offerings. Process Automation is \\#2 in the market globally.
   

  

 Based on its deep domain knowledge, experience and expertise in delivering world\\-class automation products, systems and solutions, a wide area of complimenting digital and collaborative solutions across applications and sectors, the Process Automation business helps customers remain competitive, improving their ROI and running safe and productive operations.
   

  

 We value people from different backgrounds. Could this be your story? Apply today or visit www.abb.com to read more about us and learn about the impact of our solutions across the globe.
   

  

**Fraud Warning:** 
 Any genuine offer from ABB will always be preceded by a formal application and interview process.
   

  

 We never ask for money from job applicants.
   

  

 For current open positions you can visit our career website https://global.abb/group/en/careers and apply.
   

  

 Please refer to detailed recruitment fraud caution notice using the link https://global.abb/group/en/careers/how\\-to\\-apply/fraud\\-warning.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description:
**Embedded Software Engineer – RTOS \\& Post\\-Silicon Validation (Automotive Real\\-Time MCU)**
**Location:** 
 Pune / Bangalore – India
   

  

**Join the RISC\\-V Revolution!**
**About GlobalFoundries**
 GlobalFoundries is a leading full\\-service semiconductor foundry providing a unique combination of design, development, and fabrication services to some of the world’s most inspired technology companies. With a global manufacturing footprint spanning three continents, GlobalFoundries makes possible the technologies and systems that transform industries and give customers the power to shape their markets. For more information, visit www.gf.com
   

  

**Introduction**
 We are looking for talented
 **Embedded Software Engineers** 
 to join our
 **Automotive MCU Platform Team** 
 , with a focus on
 **RTOS\\-based Software Development** 
 and
 **Application Verification \\& Validation (AVV)** 
 . You will be part of a growing team building MIPS’ RISC\\-V\\-based real\\-time processors and their associated software stack – shaping the future of embedded control systems for automotive applications like
 **EVs, ADAS, powertrain** 
 , and
 **domain controllers** 
 .
   

  

 This is a unique opportunity to contribute across the full silicon\\-to\\-software lifecycle, combining
 **software engineering** 
 with
 **post\\-silicon validation** 
 to ensure high\\-quality, safety\\-critical SoC solutions.
   

  

**Here’s What You Can Expect From Us**
 At MIPS now GlobalFoundries you’ll be a member of a fast\\-growing team of technologists that are creating the industry’s highest performance RISC\\-V processors. Small teams that are part of a non\\-compartmentalized structure – you’ll be able to understand and have an impact on the bigger picture. A great deal of autonomy, with support from some of the industry’s most experienced CPU engineers. An unlimited growth path – with the right skills, you can decide where you want to expand and grow in your role at MIPS. The opportunity to learn a great deal about the blossoming RISC\\-V architecture in cutting edge applications with industry leading customers.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
* Develop embedded software components for RTOS\\-based SDKs, including:
+ Low\\-Level Drivers (LLDs), HALs, RTOS abstraction layers, and BSPs
+ Example/demo applications to showcase peripheral functionality and performance

* Support post\\-silicon validation (AVV) by:
+ Creating validation test apps that reuse RTOS SDK components
+ Bringing up first silicon and validating critical peripherals (ADC, PWM, CAN, LIN, watchdogs, etc.)
+ Supporting automation of lab and CI\\-based test execution

* Collaborate across teams – work closely with architecture, hardware, safety, and tools teams to align software with silicon capabilities and roadmap
* Contribute to reference software and tooling to aid customers in bootstrapping their own designs
* Analyse and debug complex issues using emulators, silicon, and debug tools like OpenOCD, J\\-Link, or Lauterbach
* Provide feedback into next\\-gen MCU architecture, based on software validation findings
* Contribute to the wider RISC\\-V software ecosystem, helping to ensure support for the architecture in various open\\-source projects


**You Should Have**
* 3–6 years of hands\\-on experience in embedded systems software development
* Strong skills in C/C\\+\\+ programming, with basic familiarity in assembly
* Good understanding of RTOS concepts (task scheduling, ISRs, semaphores, etc.)
* Experience debugging complex multicore systems, experience with debugging tools (OpenOCD, Segger J\\-Link, Lauterbach)
* Experience porting or developing on FreeRTOS, Zephyr, AUTOSAR OS, or similar platforms
* Familiarity with bare\\-metal development, memory\\-mapped IO, and driver development
* Experience in bring\\-up and debugging on real silicon or FPGA platforms
* Knowledge of automotive interfaces and protocols: CAN, LIN, SPI, I2C, UART
* Practical exposure to test automation, scripting (Python/bash), and version control (git)


**Bonus Points For**
* Exposure to ASIL\\-D software development, ISO 26262 process, or safety validation
* Prior involvement in post\\-silicon AVV or hardware\\-in\\-the\\-loop (HIL) test setups
* Familiarity with RISC\\-V architecture, instruction sets, and toolchains
* Experience developing or validating motor control, powertrain, or safety\\-critical firmware
* Knowledge of bootloaders, secure update, or system startup firmware


**What You’ll Get**
* Opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge RISC\\-V platforms with real industry adoption
* A fast\\-paced, engineering\\-driven environment with minimal red tape
* Mentorship from veteran CPU and embedded software engineers
* Direct involvement in building safety\\-critical systems from the ground up
* Exposure to a full\\-stack SoC development lifecycle: from pre\\-silicon to production\\-ready
* Flexible growth path – whether you want to specialize deeply or lead in the future


 GlobalFoundries is an equal opportunity employer, cultivating a diverse and inclusive workforce. We believe having a multicultural workplace enhances productivity, efficiency and innovation whilst our employees feel truly respected, valued and heard.
   

  

 As an affirmative employer, all qualified applicants are considered for employment regardless of age, ethnicity, marital status, citizenship, race, religion, political affiliation, gender, sexual orientation and medical and/or physical abilities.
   

  

 All offers of employment with GlobalFoundries are conditioned upon the successful completion of background checks, medical screenings as applicable and subject to the respective local laws and regulations.
   

  

 To ensure that we maintain a safe and healthy workplace for our GlobalFoundries employees, please note that offered candidates who have applied for jobs in India will have to be fully vaccinated prior to their targeted start date.
   

  

 Information about our benefits you can find here: https://gf.com/about\\-us/careers/opportunities\\-asia

title: Bebo Technologies - Software Development Engineer - Test
description:
**Description**
**Required Skills :**
* BE, B.Tech, M.
* Tech, MCA or equivalent degree in Computer Science (or related field).
* 5\\+ years of QA experience.
* Strong hands\\-on experience with Selenium WebDriver and Java.
* Proficiency in TestNG, Maven, and Git.
* Experience with Azure DevOps or Jenkins for CI/CD pipeline management.
* Solid understanding of SDLC and Agile methodologies.
* Working knowledge of JIRA, Azure DevOps, or similar test management tools.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and reasoning abilities.
* Excellent communication and presentation skills.


**Responsibilities**
**Automation Framework Development :**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable automation frameworks.
* Enhance and optimize existing automation architecture.


**Script Development \\& Execution**
* Create, maintain, and execute automated test scripts using Selenium \\+ Java.


**Test Analysis \\& Optimization**
* Perform root cause analysis and troubleshoot automation failures.


**Code Quality \\& Collaboration**
* Conduct code reviews to ensure best coding practices are followed.
* Work closely with developers, business analysts, and QA teams to ensure clarity and quality.


**Version Control \\& Build Management**
* Manage and maintain repositories using Git.


**CI/CD \\& Pipeline Management**
* Configure and maintain automation pipelines using Azure DevOps or Jenkins.


**Test Case \\& Defect Management**
* Work with Test Case Management tools such as JIRA and Azure DevOps for creating, organizing, and maintaining test cases.
* Log, track, and manage defects effectively within the corresponding tools.

title: Software Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Turing is a leading organization dedicated to advancing artificial intelligence research and development. Headquartered in San Francisco, California, Turing specializes in accelerating frontier AI labs and providing enterprise solutions that leverage cutting\\-edge AI technologies. The company is renowned for its commitment to innovation, quality, and collaboration, working closely with top\\-tier AI researchers and industry partners to push the boundaries of what artificial intelligence can achieve. Turing's mission is to develop reliable, impactful AI systems that transform industries and create new opportunities for businesses worldwide. With a focus on high\\-quality data, sophisticated training pipelines, and expert software engineering, Turing stands at the forefront of AI research and application, shaping the future of intelligent systems.
   

  

**About The Role**
 Turing is seeking experienced software engineers to join our team in a pivotal role focused on designing and validating real\\-world coding tasks. This position involves working directly with open\\-source repositories, particularly on platforms like GitHub, to develop environments, extend test coverage, and create reproducible evaluation tasks. The goal is to challenge and evaluate the reasoning and execution capabilities of large language models (LLMs). This is a fully remote and flexible opportunity, allowing you to work from anywhere on your own schedule while earning competitive compensation of up to $100 per hour. The role offers a unique chance to contribute to the development of next\\-generation AI benchmarks and to influence how AI models are trained and evaluated across the industry.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess proficiency in at least one major programming language such as Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, Rust, C/C\\+\\+, C\\#, or Ruby. Hands\\-on experience with Git version control, Docker containerization, continuous integration (CI) pipelines, and navigating complex codebases is essential. Candidates should have a strong background in contributing to and evaluating open\\-source repositories, with excellent debugging, problem\\-solving, and software design skills. Additional experience with large language model (LLM) evaluation, developer tools, or AI agents is considered a plus. Excellent communication skills in English are necessary to provide precise and constructive technical feedback. The role is suitable for self\\-motivated professionals eager to work on challenging projects that impact AI research and deployment.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Identify, triage, and resolve issues within high\\-quality open\\-source repositories, ensuring code integrity and functionality.
* Set up and manage development environments, including Docker, to facilitate local testing and modifications of projects.
* Assess existing test coverage and extend unit tests to ensure reliable benchmarks for AI evaluation.
* Design and develop software engineering tasks derived from real repository histories to serve as training and evaluation data for AI models.
* Lead and mentor junior engineers in validation efforts and repository triage, fostering a collaborative and productive team environment.
* Collaborate with research teams to refine evaluation methodologies and ensure alignment with project goals.


**Benefits**
 This role offers a range of benefits designed to support your professional growth and work\\-life balance. You will have the flexibility to work remotely from any location, enabling you to create a schedule that fits your lifestyle. The position provides competitive compensation, with earnings of up to $100 per hour, reflecting the specialized nature of the work. You will be engaged in challenging projects that push the limits of AI capabilities, offering opportunities for continuous learning and skill development. Additionally, you will have the chance to collaborate with leading AI researchers and industry experts, contributing to groundbreaking advancements in AI benchmarking and training. This role also provides a platform to influence the future of AI evaluation standards and practices, making a tangible impact on the field.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Turing is committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse work environment. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. We believe that diverse perspectives and backgrounds drive innovation and excellence. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply and will be considered based on their skills, experience, and potential to contribute to our mission of advancing artificial intelligence.

title: Web Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 SAMS Social Talent Connect Pvt Ltd (SAMS\\-STC) is a dynamic platform dedicated to "Building Bridges for Social Change" by innovatively connecting organizations and talent across the Development, Public Health, and CSR sectors. Headquartered in New Delhi, we operate nationwide to empower individuals and organizations to realize their full potential through diverse opportunities, including jobs, consultancies, projects, partnerships, and collaborations. Our platform leverages cutting\\-edge technology to facilitate collaboration, visibility, and resource sharing among stakeholders committed to social impact.
   

  

 As an affiliate of Strategic Alliance Management Services (SAMS), we benefit from nearly 30 years of SAMS's extensive experience in the public health, development, and social sectors. SAMS has a proven track record in delivering effective HR consulting, Third\\-Party Payrolling (TPP), and procurement services. This heritage allows SAMS\\-STC to understand and address the unique challenges faced by organizations in resource access, sourcing expertise, and stakeholder engagement.
   

  

 SAMS\\-STC addresses these challenges through a comprehensive, tech\\-enabled platform designed to foster collaboration and enhance visibility for funding opportunities, RFPs/Tenders, and expert connections via a robust Consultant Expert Bank. Our ecosystem is powered by advanced technology, including AI\\-driven Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS) and project\\-based talent solutions, revolutionizing how the social sector engages with talent and resources. We are committed to building capacity and creating measurable impact through innovative digital solutions.
   

  

 Joining SAMS\\-STC means becoming part of a fast\\-growing startup environment that values innovation, ownership, and creativity. Our platform offers a unique opportunity to work on new concepts and live platforms that are redefining engagement within the social sector, making a real difference in communities across India and beyond.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a motivated and skilled Web Developer (WD) to join our development team. The ideal candidate will have a solid foundation in web application development, with hands\\-on experience in ASP.NET MVC, C\\#, jQuery, and related technologies. In this role, you will collaborate closely with our experienced technical team to design, develop, and maintain high\\-quality web applications that support our expanding digital solutions portfolio. Your work will directly impact the functionality, usability, and performance of our platforms, enabling us to deliver innovative social tech solutions to our clients and stakeholders.
   

  

 The Web Developer will be responsible for translating project requirements into functional, efficient, and scalable web applications. You will contribute to all stages of the development lifecycle, from conceptualization to deployment and maintenance. This role offers an excellent opportunity to work in a dynamic environment, gaining exposure to modern development practices and contributing to projects that create meaningful social impact.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or an equivalent discipline from a recognized and reputable institution. Candidates should have a minimum of 2\\-3 years of professional experience in web development, specifically working with ASP.NET MVC, C\\#, and related technologies. Experience in building, deploying, and maintaining scalable web applications is highly desirable.
   

  

 Required skills include a basic understanding of C\\# and ASP.NET MVC, familiarity with jQuery, JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, and knowledge of SQL Server or other relational databases. Exposure to Entity Framework or similar ORM tools is preferred, along with strong problem\\-solving skills and a willingness to learn new technologies. Good communication and teamwork abilities are essential for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The Web Developer will be responsible for contributing to the development and maintenance of ASP.NET MVC web applications. Key responsibilities include producing clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code in C\\#, implementing client\\-side features using jQuery, JavaScript, and AJAX, and performing database operations with Entity Framework or other ORM tools. The role also involves diagnosing and resolving issues within existing applications, engaging actively in code reviews and team meetings, and applying best practices related to MVC architecture, RESTful APIs, and responsive design.
   

  

 You will collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to ensure that applications meet technical and user requirements, participate in testing and deployment activities, and stay updated on emerging web development trends to continuously improve platform performance and security.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a competitive compensation package that is commensurate with qualifications and experience. Our organization provides opportunities for professional growth and development within a vibrant startup culture. Employees will have the chance to work on live platforms serving high\\-impact clients, gaining valuable experience in social tech solutions. We foster an environment that values innovation, creativity, and initiative, with opportunities to contribute to meaningful projects that create social change. Additionally, our team\\-oriented environment encourages collaboration, learning, and recognition of individual contributions.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 SAMS Social Talent Connect Pvt Ltd is committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We are an equal opportunity employer and do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe in fostering diversity and providing equal employment opportunities to all qualified candidates, ensuring a fair and respectful workplace where everyone can thrive and contribute to our mission of social impact.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Yoonka is a leading technology company specializing in innovative video processing solutions for broadcast and media clients worldwide. Our mission is to deliver high\\-quality, reliable, and scalable video processing pipelines that meet the evolving needs of our global customer base. With a focus on cutting\\-edge technology and continuous improvement, Yoonka prides itself on fostering a collaborative and dynamic work environment where creativity and technical excellence thrive. Our commitment to innovation has positioned us as a trusted partner for broadcasters, media companies, and content creators seeking to enhance their video workflows and deliver exceptional viewer experiences.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a talented back\\-end software engineer to join our remote team dedicated to developing and maintaining sophisticated video processing pipelines for our broadcast clients. In this role, you will be instrumental in designing, implementing, and optimizing back\\-end systems that handle complex video workflows. Your expertise will contribute to building scalable microservices architectures, integrating with cloud platforms like AWS, and ensuring high performance and reliability in our solutions. This position offers an exciting opportunity to work on state\\-of\\-the\\-art video processing technologies, collaborate with a diverse team of professionals, and contribute to innovative projects that impact the media industry globally.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a strong technical background with proven experience in back\\-end development. Candidates should demonstrate proficiency in microservices architecture, containerization with Docker, and cloud services such as AWS. Expertise in programming languages including TypeScript, Python, Java, and familiarity with AI tools is essential. A solid understanding of video processing technologies and the software development lifecycle is required. The candidate must exhibit excellent problem\\-solving skills, attention to detail, and the ability to think critically about system design and data structures. Effective communication and teamwork skills are also crucial, as collaboration across multidisciplinary teams is a key aspect of this role. While candidates from diverse locations are encouraged to apply, strong problem\\-solving ability and familiarity with algorithmic challenges are mandatory, given the interview process involves live HackerRank assessments.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a back\\-end software engineer at Yoonka, your responsibilities will include designing and developing robust microservices that support our video processing pipelines. You will be responsible for writing clean, efficient, and scalable code, ensuring system stability and performance. Collaborating with front\\-end developers, product managers, and other stakeholders to translate requirements into technical solutions will be a core part of your role. You will also be involved in deploying applications on AWS, managing containerized environments using Docker, and maintaining infrastructure that supports high availability and fault tolerance. Continuous improvement through code reviews, testing, and documentation will be expected to uphold quality standards. Additionally, you will troubleshoot and resolve technical issues, optimize algorithms for video processing tasks, and stay updated with emerging technologies relevant to our industry.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Yoonka offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees' professional growth and personal well\\-being. Enjoy the flexibility of fully remote work, allowing you to maintain a healthy work\\-life balance. We provide flexible working hours to accommodate different time zones and personal commitments. Join a friendly, multinational team that values diversity, collaboration, and innovation. Our long\\-term engagement approach ensures stability and continuous development opportunities. You will have the chance to work on interesting and impactful projects that push the boundaries of video processing technology. Compensation is competitive and aligned with market rates, based on your skills and experience.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Yoonka is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse teams foster innovation and creativity, and we are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees.

title: MERN Stack Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Different Hair Pvt. Ltd is a renowned leader in the manufacturing of high\\-quality human hair extensions and a distinguished exporter serving markets in the USA and UK. With a reputation built on excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction, the company has established itself as a trusted name in the hair industry. Our products are celebrated in prestigious hair salons, Hollywood studios, and theatrical stages worldwide, reflecting our commitment to quality and craftsmanship. We believe in continuous growth through scientific research, technological advancements, and adopting cutting\\-edge business practices to stay ahead in a competitive market.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a talented and dedicated Backend Developer specializing in the MERN stack, with a focus on Node.js and PostgreSQL, to join our dynamic team. This role offers an exciting opportunity to work on developing scalable, efficient, and secure backend services that support our innovative web applications. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical skills, a proactive approach, and the ability to collaborate effectively with cross\\-functional teams. You will be responsible for building and maintaining backend APIs, integrating databases, and ensuring seamless data flow across our platforms. This position is based on\\-site, offering a vibrant work environment where creativity and technical expertise are highly valued.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should have a minimum of 3 years of hands\\-on experience working with MERN stack technologies, particularly React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. A solid understanding of JavaScript (ES6\\+), HTML5, and CSS3 is essential. Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or Context API is required, alongside familiarity with REST API integration and debugging. Basic knowledge of backend frameworks like Express.js and database operations with PostgreSQL or MongoDB is necessary. Candidates should have experience using version control tools like Git and demonstrate a strong understanding of component\\-based architecture and reusable UI patterns. Additional skills such as TypeScript, Next.js, UI libraries like Material UI or Tailwind CSS, and basic DevOps knowledge are considered advantageous. A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field is preferred but not mandatory.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 The selected candidate will be responsible for developing high\\-quality, responsive, and interactive UI components using React.js, incorporating modern features such as Hooks, Context API, and custom hooks. You will convert UI/UX designs from tools like Figma or Adobe XD into functional web applications, ensuring cross\\-browser compatibility and optimal performance. Collaborating closely with design and product teams, you will help translate visual concepts into seamless user experiences.
   

  

 On the backend, you will develop and maintain lightweight services using Node.js and Express.js, building and integrating RESTful APIs to facilitate data exchange. Tasks will include implementing validation, routing, and minor data processing to support frontend functionalities. You will work with databases like PostgreSQL or MongoDB to perform basic CRUD operations, ensuring data integrity and security. Additionally, you will participate in code reviews, optimize existing codebases, and contribute to continuous improvement initiatives to enhance system performance and reliability.
   

  

**Benefits**
* Competitive salary aligned with your experience and expertise.
* Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance plans to support your well\\-being.
* Opportunities for professional development through training, workshops, and career advancement programs.
* Engagement in a dynamic, collaborative, and innovative work environment that fosters growth and creativity.


 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Different Hair Pvt. Ltd is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse perspectives and backgrounds enhance our workplace and contribute to our success.

Experience with Docker and Kubernetes for test execution and environment management. Understanding of AI/ML concepts in the context of software testing. title: Python Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Luxoft is a leading provider of software development services and technology consulting, renowned for delivering innovative solutions to clients across various industries including finance, automotive, healthcare, and telecommunications. With a global presence and a strong focus on digital transformation, Luxoft empowers organizations to enhance their operational efficiency and customer engagement through cutting\\-edge technology. The company's commitment to excellence, collaborative culture, and emphasis on continuous learning make it an ideal workplace for talented professionals seeking growth and impactful work.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a skilled and motivated Software Engineer to join our dynamic team at Luxoft. In this role, you will be instrumental in developing, maintaining, and enhancing our cloud\\-native platform that leverages advanced AI technologies, including LangChain AI Agents, to automate complex workflows and deliver intelligent responses across diverse domains. You will work closely with cross\\-functional teams to design scalable, secure, and innovative solutions that meet client requirements and drive business value. This position offers an excellent opportunity to work on state\\-of\\-the\\-art AI\\-driven projects utilizing a variety of modern technologies such as Python, React, Docker, and cloud services like Azure, AWS, or GCP.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a strong background in software development with expertise in backend and frontend technologies. A bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field is required. Proven experience in maintaining and upgrading .NET applications on Windows OS and Azure Cloud platforms is essential. Familiarity with MVC.Net, ASP.NET, SSIS, Web Services, Azure Web API, and IIS Administration is necessary. Experience with SQL Server databases, DevOps tools like Jenkins, GitHub, Azure DevOps, and API frameworks such as REST and SOAP is highly desirable. Candidates should demonstrate a good understanding of Agile methodologies and reporting tools like Rally or Jira. Certifications in relevant technologies or cloud platforms will be considered an added advantage.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain robust backend services utilizing Python and LangChain AI Agents to facilitate intelligent automation and decision\\-making processes.
* Design, develop, and optimize responsive user interfaces using React to ensure seamless user experiences.
* Containerize applications and microservices using Docker to enable consistent deployment across various environments.
* Manage version control and collaborative development workflows through Git and GitHub, including pull requests, branching strategies, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Deploy, monitor, and troubleshoot services on cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure, ensuring high availability and security.
* Integrate AI capabilities into the platform to automate workflows, enhance data analysis, and improve operational efficiency.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams including product managers, UI/UX designers, and QA engineers to deliver high\\-quality solutions.
* Participate in design reviews, test case development, and production support activities to ensure the stability and scalability of the system.


**Benefits**
 Luxoft offers a comprehensive benefits package designed to support the health, well\\-being, and professional growth of its employees. This includes competitive salary packages, health insurance, and wellness programs. Employees have access to continuous learning opportunities, certifications, and training programs to stay updated with the latest technological advancements. The company promotes a flexible work environment, encouraging work\\-life balance and remote working options where applicable. Additionally, Luxoft provides a collaborative and inclusive culture that values diversity, innovation, and individual contributions, fostering an environment where employees can thrive and make a meaningful impact.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Luxoft is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive workplace. We believe in diversity and are dedicated to creating an environment where all employees are valued, respected, and given equal opportunities to succeed. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, disability, or any other characteristic protected by law. Our hiring practices are aimed at attracting talented individuals from diverse backgrounds to contribute to our ongoing success and innovation.

title: Production System Optimisation Engineer (PSO)
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Specific focus is on well performance optimization and flow assurance using steady\\-state and transient flow modeling technologies.
* Provides expertise in the application of existing Chevron Integrated Production Modeling (IPM) tools and processes including Chevron's Digital Oilfield (DOF) Solution for all asset classes.
* Supports the development and deployment of new IPM technologies and DOF solution enhancements.
* Promotes IPM and DOF technologies through Communities of Practice, on demand services and formal training.
* Teaming with other disciplines and BU partners, responsibilities may include participation in subsurface surveillance and optimization platform activities.


**Required Qualifications**
* BS and MS in Petroleum Engineering or other engineering discipline.
* Experience in hands\\-on production engineering problem solving including integrated production modeling and artificial lift analysis.
* Proficient user of production engineering modeling tools with demonstrated skills to build and calibrate well, network, and reservoir models to recommend production optimization efforts.
* Experience in well performance optimization, well modeling and flow assurance.
* Demonstrated ability to identify and apply new technology to improve production performance.

title: NodeJs Developer
description:
**About The Company**
 Zemoso Technologies is a Software Product Market Fit Studio that specializes in delivering rapid prototyping and application development services to entrepreneurs and corporate innovators. Our approach emphasizes innovation as a service, guiding ideas from inception to achieving product\\-market fit through a combination of design thinking, lean execution, and agile methodologies. Recognized for our rapid growth and innovative solutions, we have been featured multiple times among Deloitte's Fastest 50 growing tech companies from India and in the Deloitte Technology Fast 500 Asia Pacific rankings in 2016 and 2018\\. Our headquarters are located in Hyderabad, India, with additional offices in Dallas, US, and Waterloo, Canada. Our leadership team boasts a history of successful ventures, including a decision management company acquired by SAP AG, and early engineering contributions to Zoho, a billion\\-dollar SaaS enterprise. Our clientele includes marquee corporations and innovative startups, reflecting our commitment to delivering cutting\\-edge technology solutions.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and passionate Software Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for creating engaging and innovative software experiences for our clients by leveraging your expertise in design thinking, lean principles, and agile development. You will work on building software products from scratch, utilizing the latest technologies, platforms, and programming languages such as Node.js and JavaScript. Your contributions will directly impact the success of our clients’ digital transformation initiatives and product development efforts.
   

  

 This position offers an opportunity to collaborate within a transparent, non\\-hierarchical culture that fosters innovation, continuous learning, and professional growth. As part of our team, you will engage in fast\\-paced projects, contribute to the development of next\\-generation software solutions, and help shape industry best practices. You will also have the chance to mentor junior developers, sharing your knowledge and experience to help grow our talented engineering community.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate will possess a minimum of 6\\+ years of experience in software development, demonstrating proficiency across a broad spectrum of programming languages and frameworks. Hands\\-on experience with server\\-side development, particularly in Node.js, is essential. You should have a strong background in JavaScript and related technologies, with a proven track record of developing scalable, efficient backend systems. UI development experience with AngularJS is mandatory, while familiarity with other frameworks such as PolymerJS, EmberJS, or jQuery will be considered an advantage. A passion for software engineering, adherence to best coding practices, and excellent problem\\-solving and communication skills are critical for success in this role.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Design and develop high\\-quality, user\\-centric software solutions utilizing design thinking, lean, and agile methodologies. Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to translate client requirements into technical specifications and actionable development plans. Build robust backend systems and APIs using Node.js, ensuring scalability, security, and performance. Develop intuitive and responsive user interfaces with AngularJS or similar frameworks, maintaining consistency and usability across platforms. Participate in code reviews, testing, and debugging to uphold high standards of code quality. Contribute to the continuous improvement of development processes, tools, and best practices. Mentor junior team members, fostering a culture of learning and innovation. Engage with clients and stakeholders to gather feedback and iteratively enhance product features and functionalities. Stay abreast of emerging technologies and industry trends to incorporate innovative solutions into our projects.
   

  

**Benefits**
 We offer a competitive salary package commensurate with experience and expertise. Our employees benefit from a fast\\-paced learning environment that encourages skill development and career progression. You will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge technologies and innovative projects that make a tangible impact on clients’ businesses. We also provide a collaborative and inclusive work culture that values transparency, creativity, and continuous improvement. Additional benefits include health insurance, flexible working hours, and opportunities for professional development through training and conferences.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Zemoso Technologies is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees and applicants are treated with respect and fairness, regardless of race, gender, age, religion, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe diversity enhances our creativity and innovation, and we actively promote a culture of equity and inclusion in all aspects of our work.

 As a Software Engineer III at JPMorgan Chase within the Connected Commerce team, you will play a crucial role in revolutionizing the way offers are set up and distributed to web and mobile applications. You will have the opportunity to design and implement Java\\-based backend systems, collaborate with cross\\-functional teams, and leverage AWS technologies to ensure scalability and performance. title: GenAI Developer
description:
**Gen AI Developer Job DescriptionAbout The Company**
 Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) is a global leader in IT services, consulting, and business solutions, renowned for its innovative approach and commitment to excellence. With a rich history spanning over five decades, TCS has established itself as a trusted partner for organizations across various industries, delivering cutting\\-edge technology solutions that drive digital transformation. The company’s extensive expertise in artificial intelligence, cloud computing, data analytics, and enterprise solutions positions it at the forefront of technological advancement. TCS prides itself on fostering a collaborative and inclusive work environment that encourages continuous learning and innovation, making it an ideal place for talented professionals to grow and contribute to impactful projects worldwide.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative Gen AI Developer to join our dynamic team in Pune or Mumbai. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying advanced generative AI solutions leveraging large language models (LLMs), Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) pipelines, and Agentic AI architectures. Your expertise will be crucial in building scalable, efficient, and robust AI applications that meet the evolving needs of our enterprise clients. You will collaborate closely with data scientists, machine learning engineers, and business stakeholders to create solutions that enhance automation, decision\\-making, and customer engagement. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in AI, machine learning, NLP, and software engineering, with a passion for pushing the boundaries of generative AI technology.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Artificial Intelligence, Data Science, or a related field.
* 6 to 8 years of hands\\-on experience in AI and software development.
* Proficiency in Python programming, with experience in building ML and NLP applications.
* Deep expertise in Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing techniques.
* Extensive experience working with large language models such as GPT, Gemini, LLaMA, Mistral, and familiarity with RAG architecture.
* Strong understanding of Agentic AI frameworks and autonomous agent design.
* Hands\\-on experience with LangChain, LlamaIndex, and other tools for developing complex LLM applications, including chains, agents, memory, and tool integration.
* Proficiency in building RESTful APIs using FastAPI and deploying solutions on cloud platforms like Azure, GCP, and AWS.
* Experience with CI/CD pipelines for model deployment and continuous integration.
* Solid knowledge of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering principles.
* Experience in building and optimizing RAG pipelines from scratch.
* Practical knowledge of containerization using Docker for packaging and deploying applications.
* Excellent communication skills, with the ability to articulate complex concepts clearly.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills, analytical thinking, and a business\\-oriented mindset.


**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement generative AI solutions utilizing LLMs, RAG pipelines, and Agentic AI architectures to meet client requirements.
* Build scalable and efficient APIs using FastAPI to serve AI models and facilitate integration with enterprise systems.
* Collaborate closely with data scientists and ML engineers to deploy models in cloud environments, ensuring robustness and performance.
* Optimize AI models for scalability, latency, and reliability in production environments.
* Develop and fine\\-tune deep learning models for NLP tasks using frameworks such as PyTorch or TensorFlow.
* Stay abreast of the latest research, tools, and advancements in generative AI and deep learning to incorporate best practices into projects.
* Implement containerization solutions with Docker for seamless deployment and scaling of AI applications.
* Participate in code reviews, testing, and documentation to ensure high\\-quality deliverables.
* Work with cross\\-functional teams to understand business needs and translate them into technical solutions.
* Maintain and improve existing AI systems, troubleshoot issues, and implement enhancements as needed.


**Benefits**
 At Tata Consultancy Services, we offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees’ well\\-being and professional growth. Employees enjoy competitive compensation packages, health insurance coverage, and retirement plans. We promote a healthy work\\-life balance through flexible work arrangements and paid time off policies. TCS invests in continuous learning and development opportunities, including training programs, certifications, and participation in industry conferences. Our inclusive work environment fosters diversity and encourages innovation, providing employees with the resources and support needed to excel in their careers. Additionally, employees have access to cutting\\-edge technology tools and platforms, enabling them to work on impactful projects that shape the future of AI and digital transformation.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Tata Consultancy Services is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive environment where all employees and applicants are treated with respect and fairness. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, disability, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws. We believe that diversity drives innovation and excellence, and we are dedicated to creating a workplace that reflects the diverse communities we serve.

title: Engineer AWS
description:
Our vision for the future is based on the idea that transforming financial lives starts by giving our people the freedom to transform their own. We have a flexible work environment, and fluid career paths. We not only encourage but celebrate internal mobility. We also recognize the importance of purpose, well\\-being, and work\\-life balance. Within Empower and our communities, we work hard to create a welcoming and inclusive environment, and our associates dedicate thousands of hours to volunteering for causes that matter most to them.
   

  

 Chart your own path and grow your career while helping more customers achieve financial freedom. Empower Yourself.
   

  

 As an Engineer AWS, you will be responsible for the ongoing development of our Amazon Connect platform with 4000\\+
   

  

 users. You will have a record of success in improving processes and adoption using the platform, working closely with
   

  

 leaders, business units, and subject matter experts to identify, configure, and deploy new business processes. This
   

  

 includes, but is not limited to: sales, support, marketing and corporate. As an Engineer AWS, you will also have a deep understanding and grasp for executing on the day\\-to\\-day configuration, support, maintenance, and improvement of our platform.
   

  

**Essential Functions**
* Deliver configurations based on specifications to meet product requirements
* Collaborate with our architects and analysts to configure and integrate components and third\\-party products, tools and solutions with the platform
* Identify and recommend solutions for application defects, determining root causes and minimizing the introduction of new defects
* Perform unit testing, code and configuration management activities, system development and providing guidance to team members
* Perform analysis, design, configuration, and implementation support for our platform
* Troubleshoot platform issues and drive exploration of options, recommending solutions and / or preparing discussion for escalation
* Study and implement new Amazon Connect features and capabilities in support of evolving business needs
* Identify and incorporate new user flows within the platform to optimize functionality


**Qualifications**
* Post\\-secondary degree/diploma in business or computer science or an equivalent combination of training and experience
* Minimum 3 years of experience as a AWS/Amazon Connect developer
* 3\\-5 years technical AWS experience building solutions in Amazon Connect
* Experience in AWS Amazon Connect, IAM, S3, Lamda, EC2, Cloudwatch, Cloudtrail, and Dynamo
* Proven ability to design and implement new processes and facilitate user adoption
* Strong understanding of the platform, with the ability to build custom apps and objects, formula fields, workflows, custom views, and other content of intermediate complexity
* Strong understanding of AWS best practices and functionality
* Previous experience working in a SCRUM or agile environment preferred
* Excellent AWS knowledge along with Polly, Lex, Pinpoint, Chime and other AWS services around connect and a positive attitude/customer focused, proficiency in Python.
* Knowledge of AI capabilities within the AWS platform,
* Experience working in Contact Center, AWS connect and Sales/Service console as agent desktop an asset
* AWS certification preferred
* Keeps up to date with platform best practices, processes, and configuration patterns
* Supports proactive identification risk and issues
* Demonstrated ability to meet deadlines, handle and prioritize simultaneous requests
* Creative and analytical thinker with strong problem\\-solving skills
* Must demonstrate exceptional verbal and written communication skills
* Ability to critically evaluate information gathered from multiple sources \\& reconcile conflicts
* Ability to assess the impact of new requirement on AWS and all upstream and downstream applications, systems, and processes


 This job description is not intended to be an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and qualifications of the job. The employer has the right to revise this job description at any time. You will be evaluated in part based on your performance of the responsibilities and/or tasks listed in this job description. You may be required perform other duties that are not included on this job description. The job description is not a contract for employment, and either you or the employer may terminate employment at any time, for any reason.
   

  

 We are an equal opportunity employer with a commitment to diversity. All individuals, regardless of personal characteristics, are encouraged to apply. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, race, color, national origin, ancestry, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity, gender expression, marital status, pregnancy, religion, physical or mental disability, military or veteran status, genetic information, or any other status protected by applicable state or local law.
